reviews.review: Une de mes licences preferes ! Humour et reflexion au rendez vous !
大概7个多小时就通关了，平均1个小时只需要1块钱就可以体验完这个神奇的游戏！G胖求求你数一下3吧

This game...
OLD BUT GOLD.
I reccomend this game to anyone willing to test himself, testing is important. Really important.
You should also test Portal 1 prior to Portal 2, just to warm up a little and test if you are capable of testing tests.
This game will make you feel smart, a genius... 5 minutes later you wonder how it is possible that you can tie your shoes, since you are obviously a potato. A frustrated one; since we are speaking about potatoes: many tests will be done on potatoes.
The experience is great and i would really thx all the people behind the creation of this psychedelic trip.
Now that i feel tested enough, i think I'm going to do some test on some of the co-op levels and other options you can select. Because once you finish the single player adventure, you will want more testing. 
Oh! And you can even open portals here and there!
you need a lot of brain and i dont have a brain so 10/10 would play again

Это прекрасная игра, игры от вальв вызывают во мне чувство на уровне закрытых пустых ТЦ. Что халфлайф что портал и это чувство мне по вкусу. Дизайн уровней, диалоги персонажей. Все сделано на очень хорошем уровне. Головоломки не сложные, но и не совсем простые иногда у меня были затупы, но они быстро решались и чем дольше ты сидишь на уровне тем, приятней решение в плане. Ты такой думаешь ААА блин решение было такое легкое. Мне жалко только что игры была пройдена мной не во время выхода. Мне кажется чувств было бы чуть больше.

Juegazo, entretenido, la historia es un poco corta, la partida me duro como unas 6/8 horas y estuvo bastante entretenido, el final una joyita, y al final una cinematica un poco flashera (bastante) pero piola. La pelea final muy entretenida.
Necesitas mas de 100 de IQ para pasarte algunos niveles pero es entretenido y para mi gusto no me aburrio

Español: En caso de que por alguna extraña razón no conozcas la saga Portal: cómpralos ya mismo ok? simplemente, hazlo. Honestamente, en mi opinión tienen un precio bastante accesible con una historia, gráficos y jugabilidad bastante buenos especialmente para juegos de 2007 y 2011.

A really fun game to play by yourself or with a friend. I suggest beginning by playing through the single player mode first, then get into the CO-OP, there is a lot of fun to be had in this game. I think anyone can complete this game no matter how dumb they are. It is made so well that the levels are hard to figure out for everyone but after some time you just figure it out. You can also go achievment hunting in this game, I haven't done it yet but I am thinking about doing it. Most of the achievments are from CO-OP. Anyways, it is just a really good game and I would pay more than 0,8 Euro on sale. Just buy it, trust me!
